data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.2.1 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.2.5 Public Beta
data.actual_result: It jumps automatically to the ending of the message.
data.expected_result: It should keep the position and not automatically jumping to the ending of the message.
data.short_description: Making line breaks in a long message automatically changes position
data.steps_to_repro: - Write or edit a long message - Scroll to the beginning of this long message - Make a line break at this position (enter)
